TopicTitle: Has anyone translated Kerbal to English?

Articles.Content: As I'm sure most of you know, in the various SQUAD cinematics, Kerbals speak in reversed Spanish, and i was wondering if anyone ever got around to figuring out what they were saying. If you've got the time, software, and Spanish fluency, please let us know!
I think someone did when the videos came out, but I can't remember who.
Reverse the sound, slow it down, and listen. Grab a piece of paper and a pencil. And 4 years of spanish. I only have two years, so no help here! Sorry
